title: exfiltration
payloads: > For an end-to-end example of staging loot in `C:\Users\Public` and exfiltrating it with Rclone to mimic legitimate backups, review the workflow below.
## Commonly whitelisted domains to exfiltrate information
Check [https://lots-project.com/](https://lots-project.com/) to find commonly whitelisted domains that can be abused
